column2: Lethargic and heavy breathing; front right paw didn't function properly; appeared unable to use hand. Tumor located mid upper back and right scapular region, but during necropsy discovered that tumor starting to encroach into the thoracic cavity via the axillary region.
DCT-TVA; Braf ca; ink/arf f/f; pten f/f

Lethargic and heavy breathing; front right paw didn't function properly; appeared unable to use hand. Tumor located mid upper back and right scapular region, but during necropsy discovered that tumor starting to encroach into the thoracic cavity via the axillary region.
Brain and skull were in tact.
1 cryo taken and 1 cell line started.
